function.name: analyze_sentiment
function.description: Analyzes fan sentiment from social media comments, posts, and engagement data. Use this tool when the query asks about: - What fans are saying or thinking - Fan reactions or sentiment - Engagement metrics or statistics - Comments, posts, or social media activity - Overall fan mood or attitude. Returns detailed sentiment breakdown, key themes, platform insights, and recommendations.

focus.description: What to focus the analysis on

function.name: generate_content
function.description: Generates creative content ideas, marketing campaigns, and event suggestions. Use this tool when the query asks about: - Content ideas or hooks for social media - Marketing campaigns or strategies - Event suggestions or planning - Social media posts or creative materials - Fan engagement activities. Returns content hooks, event ideas, and sample creative content.

function.name: forecast_trends
function.description: Forecasts future trends and predicts fan behavior patterns. Use this tool when the query asks about: - Future predictions or forecasts - Upcoming trends or patterns - What to expect or plan for - Strategic recommendations for the future - Growth projections or opportunities. Returns engagement forecasts, trend analysis, opportunities, and actionable insights.
